Description.Metadata: Easy listening Beatles [sound recording] : for people who hate rock and roll.
Words and music by John Lennon, Paul McCartney and George Harrison.

Hey Jude (Ray Conniff) -- Fool on the hill (Percy Faith, his orchestra and chorus) -- Yesterday (Ray Conniff) -- Eleanor Rigby (Johnny Mathis) -- You've got to hide your love away (Percy Faith and his orchestra) -- My sweet Lord (Johnny Mathis) -- Something (Peter Nero) -- The long and winding road (Andre Kostelanetz) -- Michelle (Andre Kostelanetz and his orchestra) -- Variations on the theme "Ob-la-di ob-la-da" (Peter Nero) -- Let it be (Jerry Vale).
Arranged and performed by various artists and ensembles.
